name: Sonic Drift 2
description:
Start your engines and prepare for the race of your life! Choose from seven of your favorite Sonic characters including Sonic, Knuckles, and Dr. Eggman (AKA Dr. Robotnik) and race your way across 17 courses in the ultimate Chaos Grand Prix.

You can also challenge a friend via local two-player multiplayer. Use each racerâ€™s special ability to gain an edge over the competition and win the fabled Chaos Emeralds!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
